mapper.select: select bl.bcode, c.name cname, bl.name bname, bl.btype, bl.ccode, decode(bl.btype, 0, 'board', 'oneboard') control from board_list bl, category c where bl.ccode = c.ccode order by ccode, bcode
select ccode, name from category order by ccode
select btype, name from board_type order by btype
mapper.insert: insert into category (ccode, name, state) values (category_seq.nextval, #{name}, 1)
insert into board_list (bcode, name, ccode, btype, role, state) values (board_list_seq.nextval, #{bname}, #{ccode}, #{btype}, 0, 1)
insert into board (bseq, bcode, id, title, regdate, notice) values (board_seq.nextval, #{bcode}, #{id}, #{title}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: select bseq, bcode, id, title, regdate from board where bcode = #{bcode} order by regdate
